thread.title: Athiya Shetty fan of Shah Rukh Khan's films
thread.title_full: Athiya Shetty fan of Shah Rukh Khan's films - Entertainment

author: PTI
title: Athiya Shetty fan of Shah Rukh Khan's films
text:
Actress Athiya Shetty likes to spend her off day by watching superstar Shah Rukh Khan's movies including 'Kal Ho Naa Ho', 'Kuch Kuch Hota Hai' and 'Dilwale Dulhaniya Le Jayenge'.

Athiya Shetty and Shah Rukh Khan 
The 22-year-old actress, who made her debut with Salman Khan's "Hero", shared a picture of few DVDs of Khan's hit on her Twitter page.
"What Sunday's are made off ?? #oldisgold #90sbaby," she captioned the pic.
Athiya is the daughter of actor Suniel Shetty and interior designer wife Mana Shetty.
